SELECT c.cv_no AS cvNo, c.user_no AS userNo, c.cover_letter AS coverLetter, c.cv_title AS cvTitle, c.cv_reg_date AS cvRegDate, c.cv_upd_date AS cvUpdDate, u.user_no AS user_userNo, u.user_name AS user_userName, u.user_id AS user_userId, u.user_pw AS user_userPw, u.user_before_pw AS user_userBeforePw, u.user_birth AS user_userBirth, u.user_phone AS user_userPhone, u.user_email AS user_userEmail, u.user_reg_date AS user_userRegDate, u.user_upd_date AS user_userUpdDate, u.user_gender AS user_userGender, u.ENABLED AS user_enabled, ae.apply_no AS applyNo, r.recruit_title AS recruit_title, r.recruit_reg_date AS recruit_reg_date FROM cv c JOIN apply_employee ae ON c.cv_no = ae.cv_no JOIN recruit r ON ae.recruit_no = r.recruit_no JOIN user u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE r.com_no = #{comNo} ORDER BY c.cv_reg_date DESC LIMIT #{page.index}, #{page.rows};
SELECT COUNT(ae.apply_no) FROM cv c JOIN apply_employee ae ON c.cv_no = ae.cv_no JOIN recruit r ON ae.recruit_no = r.recruit_no WHERE r.com_no = #{comNo};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS apply_count FROM apply_employee ae JOIN cv c ON ae.cv_no = c.cv_no WHERE c.user_no = #{userNo} AND ae.recruit_no = #{recruitNo}

SELECT COALESCE(ae.`check`, -1) AS `check` FROM apply_employee ae JOIN cv c ON ae.cv_no = c.cv_no JOIN `user` u ON c.user_no = u.user_no JOIN recruit r ON ae.recruit_no = r.recruit_no WHERE r.recruit_no = #{recruitNo} AND u.user_no = #{userNo}
